frontmatter.name: Shelley Vohr
frontmatter.title: API Modernization: Building Bridges As You Cross Them
frontmatter.bio: Shelley is a software engineer on the Electron team at GitHub who loves figuring out how to make things work. She's passionate about clean code & diving deep into tricky problems. She's also a runner, explorer, and crossword puzzle fan powered by more coffee than a human should probably drink.
